name: Get Fat!
description:
Manage your character to not get a heart attack by getting too fat or losting too much fatness! The pizza delivery mans gets you more fatness!

Arrows control the character 

Z jump (it consumes fatness) 

X Attacks (it consumes fatness) 

C Run (it consumes fatness as well lol)

Game entry for Ludum Dare 40

Made by:

Ivan Garcia - 2D Artist, Game Designer and Level Designer

Elvis Leite - Programmer and Game Designer
